title: ADC Main Looking For General Mentoring/Guidance

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body:
Hey,
 I've recently picked up Ad carry as my main role for ranked, i'm just looking for someone who could take some spare time in helping me fix out kinks and other issues i may have with laning and general fighting. I'm aiming for diamond but not sure if im really playing at that sort of level.

I can offer streams and replays to anyone who is willing to take the time and look at places where i can improve. This isn't limited to elo will take advice from anyone! :)

replies.body:
I would recommend watching [this guy](http://www.twitch.tv/lolgeranimo/profile)
He often smurfs with the goal of teaching his viewers about ADC. His main is challanger, and he almost made LCS once, you're in safe hands.
I'm more looking for someone who will take the time and look into my account. Thanks for the link though! will check it out!

Heya, I don't particularly main ADC, but I'm pretty decent, if you'd like me and a friend (if he's willing) can show you a few tips and tricks.
I also have spare time to walk you through your common mistakes, however minute they may be.

I retract this comment, you're platinum, I don't think I could teach you anything useful that you don't already know :) 
Hope you find someone!
I would recommend not playing MF until she gets buffed.
